{"id":278479325,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1573654085,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/278479325/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int len = s.length();\n        int final_len = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i) {\n            int j;\n            for (j = 0; j < i;++j) {\n                if (s[i] == s[j])\n                    break;\n            }\n            if ((i == j) && (s[j] != s[j+1]))\n                final_len++;\n        }\n        if (!final_len)\n            return 1;\n        return final_len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
